description: The Acid Batch hurled very powerful corrosive acid at its victims, though the fluid could be fused with poisons to add a bit of extra venom to the already deadly attack.
tooltip: The Acid Batch hurled very powerful corrosive acid at its victims, though the fluid could be fused with poisons to add a bit of extra venom to the already deadly attack. (Acid Batch now inflicts additional shadow damage)
